column1: Barbacena has a humid tropical climate with cool summers due to the elevation.  Summer averages are 24 °C (75 °F) and winter averages 13 °C (55 °F).  The cool climate and abundant rainfall have made Barbacena a center for flower production — the city is the biggest producer of flowers in Minas Gerais
column2: and is nicknamed "City of Roses". Cattle raising and the dairy industry are quite developed and the city is a big producer of milk products; there are also several small textile factories.
